frame.name: Retro Snake In Base
frame.subtitle: Classic snake game with retro styling
frame.description: A nostalgic take on the classic Snake game featuring retro pixel art graphics and smooth gameplay. Navigate your snake to collect food, grow longer, and achieve high scores in this timeless arcade experience.
frame.tagline: Slither Back to the Golden Age
frame.ogDescription: Experience the classic Snake game with modern polish and retro aesthetics
